title: When you are plat, and go 0/3...and then flame other players for their rank...
body: ...you reached a whole new level of pathetic.

replies.body: Doesn't this happen in every elo?
plat is just a polished silver. dw about anything they say.

I don't worry about any ranks anyway, at least not for the next 2 months.

After Dynamic Queue happened_ (gratz to that "great" decision again Rito) _there are so many boosted Plat and Dia kids running around who wouldn't even climb past Bronze on their own, its amazing.

Looking forward to all these morons prancing around in lowest Silver as soon as they are required to defend their ranks in the actual queue :-)

Honestly, it wasn't a hell of a lot better in Season 5.

It gets better when you move away from Platinum 5, but players in that division tend to be horrible.
